body.p:
48
Sept 23d 3
Albert W Clark
Hopkinsville Ky
Sir

Authority to raise troops under Special Order No : is not necessary. As soon as companies are raised and reported to this office the necessary blanks will be forwarded, an election held and the officers Commissioned.
For further information you are referred to the enclosed copy of the "State Guard Law"

respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
By
